body.name: LOL Surprise OMG Sweet Nails – Candylicious Sprinkles Shop with 15 Surprises, Including Real Nail Polish, Press On Nails, Sticker Sheets, Glitter, 1 Fashion Doll & more! – Great Gift for Kids Ages 4+

Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 35 mins

features: DISCOVER THE SWEETEST SURPRISES with the all-new L.O.L. Surprise! O.M.G. Sweet Nails – Candylicious Sprinkles Shop where you can create and design your own nails!

CREATE AND CUSTOMIZE YOUR NAILS Get ready to customize and create your own nails by peeling and pressing the nail adhesives, pressing on a set of nails, using the nail file to shape your nails, painting them, then finishing off your designs with glamorous glitter and dessert-themed stickers for more sweet, styling fun!

UNBOX 15 SURPRISES including a nail station that doubles as an ice cream pop freezer to display press on nails, nail polishes designed to look like milkshakes, a candy jar that doubles to hold real nail glitter, a nail file to shape your nails before decorating, nail adhesives to stick on the nails, and nail stickers to decorate your nails!

DRESS & STYLE the Candylicious Fashion Doll in fabulous fashions and accessories including her adorable sweater and skirt combo, stylish earrings, shoes, and her gorgeous hair all in her signature pastel colors!
ENDLESS IMAGINATIVE PLAY as you help Candylicious run the Sprinkles Shop serving popsicles, candy, and shakes using the ice cream pop freezer, candy jar, and more!
EASY STORAGE AND DISPLAY: All nails can be neatly stored and displayed in the nail station to showcase UR beautiful nail designs!
COLLECT ALL 3 unique Sweet Nails Shops: Kitty K Café, Pinky Pops Fruit Shop, and Candylicious Sprinkles Shop!
body.description: Discover the sweetest surprises with L.O.L. Surprise! O.M.G. Sweet Nails™ – Candylicious Sprinkles Shop™ including an ice cream pop freezer, unique nail accessories, and fan-favorite character, Candylicious, styled in her signature pastel colors and gorgeous hair! Help run the fabulous Candylicious Sprinkle Shop™ and unbox amazing surprises inside, where you can make your own popsicles and serve beautiful milkshakes! First, open up the ice cream pop freezer and reveal 24 pretty, pastel nails that look like popsicles and can be placed on UR own nails and decorated! Look closely at the nails to explore cute dessert-themed details including ice cream cones, doughnuts, and more! Then, discover 2 outrageously fun milkshakes, and open up the bottles to reveal two trendy nail polish colors to apply on the nails! Check out the sweet, pink candy jar and open it up to reveal REAL nail glitter! Now you are all set to get creative and customize your own nails – peel and press the nail adhesives, press on a set of nails, use the nail file to shape your nails, paint them, then finish off your designs with glamorous glitter and dessert-themed stickers for more sweet, styling fun! When designing your nails, don’t forget to place your fingers on the finger grooves on the top of the nail station for greater stability! The pop freezer also serves as a nail display case to store and showcase your delightful popsicle treats when finished! This adorable dessert shop has the sweetest surprises ever with realistic styling to help spark your imagination when running the Candylicious Sprinkles Shop™ with the gorgeous Candylicious Fashion Doll and her fabulous fashions and accessories. Candylicious has stunning features, stylish hair, and is articulated with tons of poses. Pro Tip: Hands are removable for easy dressing. Collect all 3 unique Sweet Nails™ Shops: Kitty K Café™, Pinky Pops Fruit Shop™, and Candylicious Sprinkles Shop™ and create dozens of designs! L.O.L. Surprise fashion dolls with stylish hair, outfits and many detailed accessory pieces make a perfect toy for kids, including 4 years old and up for imaginative pretend play! As gifts for any special occasion, dolls provide hours of social play with siblings and friends! From MGA Entertainment, creators of L.O.L. Surprise fashion and collectible dolls, Rainbow High™ fashion dolls, Na Na Na Surprise dolls, Bratz® fashion dolls, MGA's Dream Ella™, MGA's Glitter Babyz™, Lalaloopsy™, Baby Born® Surprise baby dolls and collectibles, Little Tikes® kids' toys and many other favorite brands.

reviews.reviewText: I have the original one and I prefer her more but this one is very cute and I got her cuz why not!The shoes are very detailed and gorgeous and I love the soft sweater she comes with.

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The dolls came in time. Doll and items inside are fine. However, the box the doll came in is damaged. It’s all scuffed up and even something penetrated through the box. I can tell it’s not damaged from shipping cause the packaging wasn’t damaged, only the box housing the doll.
Super mignonne j’ai hâte de l’offrir à mon enfant
